website_summaries.verdict: Outdoor adventures are much more comfortable with the Adidas Vigor Bounce. Hugely positive comments and reviews make this model very agreeable to those who want a reliable neutral shoe for their off-road treks and for their forays into outdoor sports.
pros: Some runners stated that the Adidas Vigor Bounce was suitably lightweight for their trail-running experiences
The snug & secure fit was lauded by a tester
A lot of testers noted that they liked the appealing design and color-schemes of this running shoe
The cushioning system felt responsive and bouncy, commented some users
There were those who listed ‘shock absorption’ as a pro when they reviewed this model
One commenter wrote that the traction given by the outsole made it great for off-road running and for outdoor sports like softball
Many were impressed by its durability because it lasted longer and didn’t suffer any noticeable damage
A majority of the runners who tried the Adidas Vigor Bounce noted that it was true to its size
cons: There was a reviewer who felt that the Adidas Vigor Bounce fit a little larger than the usual
Several consumers reported that this shoe was not as comfortable as the other ones with the ‘Bounce’ technology
The forefoot section was a bit restrictive, complained a tester
A runner observed that its upper unit wasn’t breathable
his feet felt hot while wearing it

customer_reviews.title: A lot compliment!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes and feel confortable prices was very good on amazon and shipping was very fast is a little heavy shoes but look great! I'm very happy
customer_reviews.author: GERZONSISSY

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, feels great...highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these so much I bought a second pair! Use them for mountain biking, hiking, trail running & misc. day to day activities & sports. Went to SE Asia last month and these wewre amazing while hiking / walking 5-10 + miles a day, day after day.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great offroad running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Really like this shoe for trail running and general "offroading". I wore this for a 12 hour Spartan race event and they were great. The fit was strong enough to stay on my foot through slogs and slogs of mud, but loose enough so that my feet didn't go numb with heavy movement (like a 3 mile ruck run through a corn field). When they aren't covered in gunk they look pretty good too.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but what happened in transit?!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes and had several pairs in different colors. My only problem is that when the item was delivered there was a large hole in the bag and the box holding the shoes was completely mangled. When I dumped the contents of the box, mulch and other trash came out as well. Not sure where this occurred along the line but I was not impressed. If there had been any inclement weather the shoes would have been damaged.
customer_reviews.author: chelko

customer_reviews.title: Very happy, does everything I need out of a shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I got the black/yellow ones and they look great, they feel good to wear, sole dampens a good amount of impact and the tread is fantastic. Doesn't seem like they need much break in time either, I took them out of the box and hit the gym and didn't end up with blisters. Might even buy a 2nd pair!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, tight,
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoes (black-neon green), good grip, great for short runs. Now I work 10hr shifts so after awhile my feet huts at the top cause it's short, and the tongue has an imperfect shape. So if you wear insoles, this shoe won't fit right, you'll have to size up. So I wear thin socks, so my feet can have more room.
customer_reviews.author: Thiago Vaz

customer_reviews.title: Great for rocky trails
customer_reviews.text: Just started trail running recently after doing strictly road runs. With my plain road running shoes I'd always have several painful steps with rocks pushing into my arch or ball of my feet. With these shoes I never have any issues with rocks and I'm able to go faster with the extra grip, especially on downhill and rocky portions of the trail. Definitely worth the money if you plan on lots of trail running. Can't wait for my first trail 10k with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: P O G

customer_reviews.title: Love adidas, own every pair generation of vigors
customer_reviews.text: Love adidas, own every pair generation of vigors. First time i put them on wanted to send back, glad i didnt few hours wearing them around house i didnt want to take them off. Feet stay warm and dry and my socks are never wet or sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good grip on rocks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe to test it out for hiking and it wasn't bad.. during the few times out with them on I noticed the grip was solid.. I wasn't slipping on parts that old shoes have.. no ankle support was the reason I ended up giving them away..
customer_reviews.author: LaMont

customer_reviews.title: I love those sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love those sneakers. I bought them for a trip to Utah and didn’t have any time to break them in before that. First time I put them on I went on a 10 mile hike through the canyons and at the end of the day my feet felt great, no pressure points, no pain. They offered very good support and traction on all kinds of terrain. Went though sand, gravel, mud, climbed slippery rocks, no problem at all. I like the wider heal too, definitely helped over uneven surfaces. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gotinoto

customer_reviews.title: Less comfy
customer_reviews.text: I like it . But it's lack some comfort when running. Maybe because it's designed for trial running I'm not sure. But it's good after all. I had to buy another running shoes that were lighter and softer.
customer_reviews.author: Majed

customer_reviews.title: Dope but funky & kinda cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Look sick fit good but if your looking for cushion keep it pushing. These are good running shoes if you like to feel the ground. Amazing grip on the bottom definitialy made for off road. No vents for your toes is a downside be prepared for some sweaty feet and compliments. After about a mile of walking the black graphics are coming off and the soul looks ready to seperate!
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Good hard surface shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about this shoe but ordered it anyway. Size 12.5 fits perfectly (right foot 12.5 and left is 12). Very comfortable and good cushioning on the stride. Toe box is a bit wider than some other brands that I've tried without heal lift.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Ronan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing comfort. Proven.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality, hiked 50 miles in them and they’re ready to retire. Not bad for sub $50 shoes. No sore feet, great cushion, no hot spots, great toe box. Could get another 25 miles if I glue the separating parts
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: I always got compliments on these....
customer_reviews.text: I always got compliments on these until I actually used them to hike. They don't last long if you use them for the intended purpose. Great fashion shoe though.
customer_reviews.author: lewis95656

customer_reviews.title: ... you so much for this item these shoes were amazing the tread on these shoes look like tread from ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for this item these shoes were amazing the tread on these shoes look like tread from a car they are so adorable I bought them for my husband and he absolutely loves them they fit amazing he said they are very comfortable they came package extremely well and a very nice box we are so happy with your product we will definitely order from this company again thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Kim Tingler

customer_reviews.title: These are GREAT fitting shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and great fitting shoes. I have always trusted Adidas and these do not disappoint. They fit as expected albeit a little snug, but in a good way. The deep heel gives great support and cushion. And as you can see by the toys in the picture these are great for keeping up with a rambunctious 3 year old. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Comfort at its best!
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are just what i needed. Soon as you slip these on you feel the comfort and support on your feet. I work in a hospital I am basically on my feet all day for 12 hours. These have the support you’ll need and more. I didn’t go home with pain in my feet. Worth the price also
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy lagoa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, lacks durability.
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a huge adidas fan, so I ordered these for my fiancé in August and gave them to him in September for a birthday present. He has worn them about 6 times since then and they have already ripped. I am super disappointed and dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: The Shoe Didn't Last A Year.
customer_reviews.text: I put shoes to the test, lots of hiking and walking. What I liked about these shoes was their immediate comfort and light weight. Unfortunately, they didn't even last the year, with the sole wearing flat. Also, cracks developed on the outside near the toes that allowed water to soak your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Noel H.

customer_reviews.title: ... 2nd pair of these as the 1st pair were great.. These are way too narrow compared to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of these as the 1st pair were great.. These are way too narrow compared to my 1st pair. Will require some breaking in before theyre comfortable. Did i mention that i hate breaking in new shoes?
customer_reviews.author: Rob Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Not a comfortable as the reviews stated
customer_reviews.text: Not a comfortable as the reviews stated. I'm a middle school teacher and football coach. My feet were tired after a long day. The stability was average; teaching my players the drills
customer_reviews.author: Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable, Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Alot more comfortable than the last adidas that I purchased these are wonderful. Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the shoes for my kid so he had shoes to use around the neighborhood for playing. He ended up using the shoes for school because he likes them a lot. He says they are very comfortable and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey A.

customer_reviews.title: Light with great support. Bought a half size bigger as recommended ...
customer_reviews.text: Light with great support. Bought a half size bigger as recommended by the reviews and fits perfectly. Ran a 5k with it and was very comfortable. Did not even need time to break the shoes in. Had an Adidas Boost before this and provides comparable impact absorption which is very important for me with past knee injuries. Very satisfied and pleased with the aesthetics as well. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Zeyar Min

customer_reviews.title: Adidas nailed it again
customer_reviews.text: Terrific design and materials. I like my running type shoes tight. Not "choking the living hell out of your feet" tight, but just enough for stability on uneven dirt trails. Now for the esthetic part: got the black/yellow ones. Kinda cool and different.
customer_reviews.author: Badger

customer_reviews.title: so I assume they are comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband... He loves that they match his PT uniform... ::facepalm:: He wears them though, so I assume they are comfortable...? But they don't keep dirt and wipe off easily so they're great! <3
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: These are the best shoes I have purchased in a long time
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes I have purchased in a long time! They're comfortable and they don't get dirty easily and they are very well made. I wore them daily since buying them until I got my new shoes a week ago. Great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Adam S.

customer_reviews.title: Okay trail running shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Got them for a low price so I can't knock them that much. The laces dont stay as secure as I'd like but they are comfortable enough and the fit is true to size and great for wide feet. Not the most breathable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: J08hawks

customer_reviews.title: Great looking sneakers-however the plastic makes them hard to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Great looking sneakers-however the plastic makes them hard to get your feet into the sneakers -it will take time to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: DiDi

customer_reviews.title: If you got feet like a kangaroo buy these shoes if not avoid at all cost
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design but when I got them they where way to narrow I guess you could say something to have wide feet but I even think for a normal foot they would be to narrow like who thought of these shoes were meant for? Kangaroo? They got long feet right? Idk I had to send mine back
customer_reviews.author: will harris

customer_reviews.title: Might get a 3rd pair
customer_reviews.text: I loves these. I have 2 colors. Light and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: BIMMERe46

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Some of the most comfortable shoes I've ever had in my life and very attractive however already beginning to deteriorate
customer_reviews.author: Warbat

customer_reviews.title: Not that great of a shoe.
customer_reviews.text: The picture looked way better than the actual shoe. While the fit was what I expected and was comfortable with, the quality leaves a lot to be desired. Loose threads, the sole is starting to detach from normal occasional wear. Adidas is usually a good brand, maybe I got the first shoe of the first run on a Monday morning, either way, the shoe is not made to last and I am having doubts about purchasing Adidas off of Amazon any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product Review
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes... I have three pairs of different colors... great on my joints specially my knees...
customer_reviews.author: lui

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the traction on the bottom of the shoe. Nice fit and comfortable to wear and walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne M Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Narrow toe box
customer_reviews.text: Traction is solid but toe box is extremely narrow. Not recommend for wide feet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: A good but not great shoe. Cannot complain. Visually it is unique.
customer_reviews.author: R.Syling

customer_reviews.title: Would def purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Hubby says these are the most comfortable shoes he’s ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid, comfortable, hiking/running shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Durable, great traction, and comfortable for hiking and running outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smelly
customer_reviews.text: Light weight... Felt like plastic and smelled like mold. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: I usually like adidas shoes but these ran somewhat smaller and tighter ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually like adidas shoes but these ran somewhat smaller and tighter than I expected. The shoes are also a bit more stiff when compared to other trail shoes I’ve tried in the past. The company also took what I feel was quite a while to ship something that was “in stock” with no explanation as to why they were that delayed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware product not as described
customer_reviews.text: Item not as described. The color in the picture is way off from the color we got. Very disappointed! Will not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing color and style. I receive compliments everytime I wear.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing color and style. I receive compliments everytime I wear.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Toe box
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes these but he said the toe box is a little snug.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: He has really bad knees and he loves how comfortable they feel on ...
customer_reviews.text: I get the Vigor Bounce sneakers for my Dad. He has really bad knees and he loves how comfortable they feel on him. He also loves the style of them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabbby
customer_reviews.text: Nice look great feel. Just have to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt mtr

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes comfort is amazeing very light and form fitting shoe
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Runs small and narrow
customer_reviews.text: Way too narrow. Have always been happy with addidas fit and durability but had to return.
customer_reviews.author: W. L. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for that price
customer_reviews.text: Day 1: When I opened the box found that it is US 10 and UK 9.5, usually it should be UK 9. Thought will be big as they looked big, but when I tried them they're tight. Probably something to do with my feet structure. Need to use them couple of times before commenting on performance.
customer_reviews.author: RKV

customer_reviews.title: The material is great, but the bottom sol has hardly any give ...
customer_reviews.text: The material is great, but the bottom sol has hardly any give back when your running so the sole is a little too hard. Overall it's okay but I have had better trail running shoes for similar price.
customer_reviews.author: Harry B Kong

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe initially
customer_reviews.text: Initially great shoe but started falling apart after a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Grajal

customer_reviews.title: Terrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is perhaps the most disappointing and worst quality item I’ve ever bought on here. Didn’t even hold up a month.
customer_reviews.author: John Quinalty

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking well fitting shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking shoe. My son loves it . He wears it to walk and for use when not at work. Good support and wide enough to not pinch toes. Quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: TANIDIA

customer_reviews.title: Good fit. Very HOT shoe, doesn't breath at all.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Comfortable. Very HOT shoes. they don't breath at all. I set them aside for now. Too hot for summer, I'll use them as a winter running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Good workout shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good brand of sneaker, I use them to work out.
customer_reviews.author: Napoleon Contin

customer_reviews.title: Bounce!
customer_reviews.text: I love to play volleyball in these shoes because of the bounce in them!
customer_reviews.author: Redshiftkid

customer_reviews.title: ... of the school year and they are still in great shape!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son at the beginning of the school year and they are still in great shape!

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Sole of shoe is sepertating after a few days of wearing ...... pretty disappointed it’s a good looking shoe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adidas are the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: These fit great! I’ve worn Nike shoes forever and have been having problems with my feet hurting after a long day of walking on hard surfaces. These Adidas Vigor shoes make my feet not hurt..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow in the toe
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow in the toe box. Caused them to be uncomfortable. My husband has long narrow feet and these were still too narrow in the toe.
customer_reviews.author: alemay33

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My fourth pair of these and they are made to handle heavy action .
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Nolan

customer_reviews.title: He says they are so light and comfortable and he wants to wear them all the time
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son absolutely loves these. He says they are so light and comfortable and he wants to wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Needs some breaking in.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great shoe it was a little tight but I think even had I got a size up it still would have had the same tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: frankie

customer_reviews.title: my son loves them
customer_reviews.text: my son bought these shoes and just loves them. stated they fit perfect and everyone at his job asked where he got them from. thank you he is a happy camper
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Size: Bought a size 8 and it fits ...
customer_reviews.text: Design: Excellent Size: Bought a size 8 and it fits perfectly Comfortable: Yes Recommend: Yes!!
customer_reviews.author: Azurite

customer_reviews.title: Great for running all day
customer_reviews.text: Great for running all day, as a soccer ref. A little narrow for my foot, but much more comfortable than cleats
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: ... two games of softball so far and they are great. I get the same traction out of these ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for two games of softball so far and they are great. I get the same traction out of these on the grass and dirt as I do with cleats, but these feel more like shoes than cleats. We play modified fast pitch so there is stealing and sprinting a lot and I am so much less sore after games with these.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Fit is good and surprisingly comfortable on runs
customer_reviews.text: My first Adidas running shoes. Fit is good and surprisingly comfortable on runs. If they have some durability these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: These shoes was the worst shoes I ever had
customer_reviews.text: These shoes was the worst shoes I ever had! I run around 45 miles a week in the mountains and I haven't been able to adapt to them! My plant is hurting and my toenails are black
customer_reviews.author: Harold Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I got them for my husband and they looked awesome on him
customer_reviews.text: I got them for my husband and they looked awesome on him. But the were a little too big. He likes them so much that he double his socks for the right fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sugar Rush

customer_reviews.title: love the insole
customer_reviews.text: Sharp looking, love the insole. Guess my dog liked them too because she ate one. Loved them till then!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja C Grooms

customer_reviews.title: Look good, feel good.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the blue ones for my husband to use for running and everyday walking. He says they are comfortable and broke in easily. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: KalaniTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Worth it check them out!
customer_reviews.text: They are a little stiff but I hope that will go away once they are broken-in. But other wise really nice shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: nice product at this price
customer_reviews.text: I have the most funky ones (my friends say). I love the shoes, the way they look and sense of comfort they give. But wear it with socks. It started to scratch my feet's fabula if i wear it with very short socks. It hurts :-)
customer_reviews.author: Vatsal

customer_reviews.title: These sneakers are incredibly comfortable. The quality of materials is super
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are incredibly comfortable. The quality of materials is super! Are worth the money spent. I love Adidas Vigor.
customer_reviews.author: Sergey Ukraina

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great hiking and trail runner. So comfortable that I actually jog in them too.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Recommend getting a half or one size bigger
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 12 and it's very tight. Recommend getting a half or one size bigger. Overall good shoe just runs small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have held up great.
customer_reviews.text: Son lioed these for running and tennis. Have held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe. I always liked Adidas. They put the highest quality materials in their products.
customer_reviews.author: GScindian

customer_reviews.title: Size results
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a previous pair of Adidas in size 13; they were a bit tight on the sides and in the toe. When I initially ordered these, I ordered a size 14 because of the previous adidas shoe purchase. The 14's in this model where big in the toe and sides. So, I ordered a 13, and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Franz Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to put on. Very tight where first eyelets began. No strap to pull heel up and slide foot in. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these are really great sneakers. Look sharp and very supportive.
customer_reviews.author: R. Labbe

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted two months
customer_reviews.text: Lasted less then two months before sole started Separating from shoe.
customer_reviews.author: David Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: My first online order of Adidas shoes worked out perfectly, especially being familiar with the brand and the sizing.
customer_reviews.text: The fit was nearly perfect for my size 10. I have always preferred Adidas shoes over other brands based on my feet. These felt a bit narrow out of the box but after lacing them up and taking a few steps, they fit like any other Adidas shoe I have.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M Ostendorf

customer_reviews.title: good quality but tight
customer_reviews.text: Loved the design but very tight in the toes and width, had to return them. Wish they had a bigger size available
customer_reviews.author: big-sales

customer_reviews.title: satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Extremely good looking and top quality. Hard to please 13 yr old loves them.
customer_reviews.author: cathy

customer_reviews.title: Might fall apart soon!
customer_reviews.text: They are alright. Fit well, but ive literally only used these 3 times, nd the threading down the center of the shoe is fuzzy at the front tips. Like its about to tear. On both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Tjbassmekanik, thee basshead

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Took these out of the box, into my suitcase and on vacation. I LOVE them! Absolutely comfortable, fit perfectly and I'm ordering another pair, or 5
customer_reviews.author: Frank Florindi

customer_reviews.title: Pt shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great! I use them mainly for running on road. Only downside is that when it’s really the top of the shoe gets really warm and it starts to burn the top of your feet. Other than that this shoe is great for running, and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe design but ended up being too small. Go up a half a size when purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great for hiking. My husband loved them and he said they are super comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: ... He's 10 years old but wears size 6 Comfy great
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes He's 10 years old but wears size 6 Comfy great shoes
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: Rubs
customer_reviews.text: Fits fine. The plastic on the shoe sticks up further then I would like it too. Rubs against my ankle alot.
customer_reviews.author: Jw W.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, style design is flawed
customer_reviews.text: They seem like a good shoe but the design add-ons started separating from the bottom edge of the shoe the day I wore them. Besides that flaw, I love these, they are pretty comfy and look pretty sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Paucar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe. Fits like a glove and is very comfortable. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Viewpapa

customer_reviews.title: loved them and wears them
customer_reviews.text: My picky son, loved them and wears them! A miracle!
customer_reviews.author: ChrissyGinger

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking And Durable Sneakers For A Pre-teen
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these. They did start fraying a bit on the cross sections, but not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: W. T. McWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Wide foot excepted.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! I have a wide foot and it’s painful to run in any other shoes. I’d recommend to everyone with wide feet. Totally buying in other colors!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aryk garcia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable enough for a 3 mile run, right out of the box. Very pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: D-Rail

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Vigor Bounce m Trail Runner, Shock Slime/Black, 8 M US
feature_bullets: Weight: 9.5 ounces (size 9); Runner type: neutral; Midsole drop: 8.5 mm
BOUNCE provides energized comfort for all sports, all day
Breathable air mesh upper with protective overlays offers durability and support; Padded collar provides enhanced cushioning; Printed "adidas" graphic on side
Supportive synthetic cage for best lockdown
